en_US.Name: Fine-Tuning and Deploying Large Language Models with Swift
en_US.Description: ModelScope Swift is an efficient fine-tuning training and inference framework developed by the ModelScope community. With just a few lines of code, developers can fine-tune and deploy large language models. In the current document, we will use the Qwen-7B-Chat model as an example to demonstrate how to perform fine-tuning training and model deployment on the PAI platform using the ModelScope Swift through the PAI Python SDK.

zh_CN.Name: 通过PAI Python SDK使用Swift微调和部署大语言模型
zh_CN.Description: ModelScope Swift是 ModelScope 社区开发的高效微调训练和推理框架，开发者可以通过数行代码即可完成大语言模型的微调和部署。 在当前文档中，我们将以Qwen-7B-Chat模型为示例，展示如何通过PAI Python SDK在PAI平台上使用ModelScope Swift进行微调训练和模型部署。
